content:
In order to better assist you with your issue please provide us with a screenshot. If you need help to create a screenshot, please see How do I create a screenshot of my problem?

Once you've done this, attach the saved screenshot file to your forum post by clicking the Browse... button below the Post your reply box. This will help us to visualize the problem.

Note: If you have problems when uploading the image to this forum, you can use imgur. com or a similar image host if the image appears to hang on upload, then add a link to the image. However, this may delay a response if the external link needs review by a moderator.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
> Mozilla are

Thunderbird is developed by MZLA

> no option to either create a new folder or create a new sub folder. I tried to convert a little used Local Folder, and lost the sub folders.

Yeah, not a good idea to change "Local Folders" it's a special folder which you should not have been able to change in Thunderbird. Did you change it in the OS?

Creating folders and subfolders definitely is there in the product, unchanged. Something is wrong with your setup. Try Help > Troubleshoot Mode?

content: If you mean 'keep but not use', that's not an option. Thunderbird will routinely attempt to retrieve messages. Your option would be to remove password, in which case it doesn't retrieve messages, but will annoy you with prompts for the password.
creator: davidsk

content: Is this the Primary Password that you forgot? Or an account password? Or is this your Windows password? Please clarify and tell us at what step you are asked for the password, such as - when you attempt to install Thunderbird, when you attempt to start Thunderbird, or when you attempt to retrieve or send messages? Thank you.

content:
Andrey Safronov said
Hi. I've got locks on my drawers, what do I do?

If you mean there are lock icons on the account icons in the Folder Pane, it means the connection is secure, i.e. SSL/TLS or STARTTLS security. If that is specified by the provider, there's no action required on your part.

content:
Informazioni utili da fornire nelle richieste al forum:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
creator: @next

Are you using the part of the address before the @ as the User Name or the full email address?

content: First, you may be able to use your old profile, as its settings for the account may still be current. Second, yes, you can install thunderbird and create a new account setting for your Spectrum account if you have the specfications for the account. Thunderbird's setup process knows settings for some email providers, but not all.
